name: Bounce (itch) (LenSJ, TaengYi)
description:
A jumping game, get to the top but don't let the lava get you.

Key Features:

-Multiple Platforms

-Jumping

-Level Progression

The Bitbucket:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/gameaweek_g6/src/master/

release note:

-version 1.0 full release

Credits:

-Geumseong Han

-Lenny Steve Jox

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
